sub_title: Business Development | Passion for Innovation | MSc Chemistry for Energy and Sustainability
summary:
- Expect the best, plan for the worst, and prepare to be surprised! - D. Waitley

I am currently working full-time as manager and business developer for the Amsterdam Chemistry Network. In this role I work as a bridge between researchers and business companies, to promote innovation in the Chemistry field. Sometimes, it is only a matter of connecting the right dots! My contagious enthusiasm, natural good humour and outgoing attitude have constantly led me to search for total-personal development environments. I acquired management and problem-solving skills from non-academic experience, such as competitive sports, planning, organization and production of festivals, volunteer activities, and working, of course.

Constantly asking myself: 
-Which parties would be willing to join, and at what point?
-What are the expertise, roles and goals of each party?
-On what shared interest we can set up a collaboration?
-What contribution can the different players offer in this innovation?
